price: Na walio kufuru na wakakadhibisha Ishara zetu, hao ni watu wa Motoni, watadumu humo milele. Na hayo ndiyo marudio mabaya.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
footnotes: Na walio ikataa Imani, na wakaikanusha miujiza yetu tuliyo wapa Mitume wetu kuwaunga mkono, hao ndio watu wa Motoni. Watadumu humo. Na marudio maovu ni hayo walio yarudia hao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri khālidīna fīhā wabi'sa al-maṣīru
